I hereby grant you the property free of charge and with all rights and privileges, and grant you the right to donate and sell the property. You shall pay the Panchayat fees and other charges for the said property from now on, and you shall have the right to donate, sell and sell it at your own discretion, with the exclusive rights of ownership, water, You can enjoy the property with the pashanadhi, dhana, kanaka, nidhi, nikshema, and achandark level. If you enjoy the schedule property in this way, then in the future neither you, your heirs, your assignees, nor I, my heirs, nor my assignees will be able to cause any kind of disputes. Whatever disputes have arisen from anyone in the past regarding the said dakha property, I can avoid them at my own expense and implement this dakha property under you without any interruption. The dakha property has not been alienated to anyone before. The relevant forms are to be filed herewith for the registration of your name in the Panchayat accounts for this property. This property is not I do not own the property. And there is no encumbrance or any other encumbrance. This property is not an assignment by the Government under Act 9/77. I agree to pay a penalty of three times the amount of the stamp duty due for any omission to pay the stamp duty or for any violation of any provision of the Act, as per section 41A of the Indian Stamp (Andhra Pradesh Amendment) Act No. 16/2002 and sub-section (2) of section 70 of the Indian Stamp (Andhra Pradesh Amendment) Act. I do not have the right to cancel or alter this deed in future. This deed has been prepared as per the information given by the parties. with OKEN Scanner

I On 22-07-2025, I have registered the deed of sale in your name in the office of the Vinukonda Sub-Registrar as Book 1 No. 9225/2025. Gift Settlement in f/o family
Mkt.Value:Rs. 554000

sections.content: The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No. 9225 of 2025, dated 23/Jul/2025, executed by Shaik Syda in favour of his Wife, Shaik Basur Bhi towards the property admeasuring an extent of 96.8 Sq. Yds (or) 871.2 Sq. Ft., bearing house number 3-26, comprised in survey number 294, situated in Mellavagu Village & Grama Panchayati, Bollapalli Mandal, within the District of Palnadu, registered at sub-registrar office Vinukonda, is bounded as follows: Boundaries As Per the Deed North by: Cement Road South by: Site of Rayavarapu Punnaiah East by: Bata West by: Bata Boundaries As Per the Rectification Deed North by: Site of Executant South by: Site of Rayavarapu Punnaiah East by: House of Aatukoori Ramarao West by: Bata

As per Registered Documents: 1. The property in survey number 294, bearing house no. 3-26, situated in Mellavagu, measuring about 96.8 Sq. Yds (or) 871.2 Sq. Ft., was originally owned by Shaik Syda, who acquired the property through inheritance from his ancestors. [Ref.Deed] 2. The aforementioned Shaik Syda executed a Gift Settlement Deed on 23/Jul/2025, registered as document No. 9225 of 2025, before the SRO Vinukonda, in favour of his Wife, Shaik Basur Bhi towards the property measuring 96.8 Sq. Yds (or) 871.2 Sq. Ft., bearing house no. 3-26, Assessment number 349, comprised in survey number 294, at Mellavagu.Schedule property is part of Grama kantam as per deed. 3. Thereupon, the said Shaik Syda, executed a Rectification deed dated 30/Jan/2026, registered as document No. 1100 of 2026, before the SRO, Vinukonda, in favour of Shaik Basur Bhi, an error has crept in the Principal Deed No. 9225 of 2025, in which the North & East Boundaries was wrongly mentioned as (North by : Cement Road, East by : Bata ), instead of (North by : Site of Executant, East by : House of Aatukoori Ramara ) which has been rectified through this document. [Part and Parcel of Pledging document]. (B) Additional Documents Supporting the Title : The Property Tax Receipt No. 406 , dated 20/Mar/2025, imprinted by the Mellavagu Panchayath Secretary discloses that Shaik Syda has paid property tax towards house number 3-26, Assessment number 349. Note: It is advisable to verify that the tax is paid up-to-date towards the schedule property.
The property tax receipt attached discloses that Shaik Syda is the taxpayer, hence, it is presumed that the mutation proceedings were not concluded in the name of the current owner Shaik Basur Bhi.

sections.content: We have reviewed the documents provided to us as per the F.I policy and have concluded that the Shaik Basur Bhi, possesses a clear, valid, and marketable title to the property measuring 96.8 Sq. Yds (or) 871.2 Sq. Ft., bearing house number 3-26, comprised in survey number 294, situated in Mellavagu Village & Grama Panchayati, Bollapalli Mandal, within the District of Palnadu, registered at sub-registrar office Vinukonda.

Note: 1. It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number, and Split Survey/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible. 2. Please note that we have not conducted any fresh EC search after we have released the initial legal report dated 31-Jan-2026. Upon request from the FI we have reworked on 02-Feb-2026 in the updated report.
